title: Runner
description: Runner is the cruel tale of a young girl trapped in the legal system.  Orphaned by the death of her parents, Runner is sent to live with her aunt and uncle. While there she becomes embroiled in a series of crimes, resulting in a conviction for murder. The police sergeant responsible for her arrest offers to marry her to keep her from going to prison for the rest of her life. Though he appears to be her knight in shining armor she soon discovers she made a big mistake. Prison would have been a happier choice.  "Runner" contains sex and violence.
author: Marie Ann Phillip
